Articles.Content:
Out of the box, NovaPunch ships a few fins that use the stock Winglet module. Nobody has published FAR data for these parts yet, so I decided to roll my own. Measurements were determined by eyeball comparison to the stated dimensions of NovaPunch fuel tanks.

License: CC0 (no restrictions). Link to the license in the file.

DOWNLOAD:

http://www.filedropper.com/novapunchwingletsfar

Usage: Uses ModuleManager. Save anywhere under GameData/.

Edited April 15, 2014 by undercoveryankee
Added usage info.

Thank you! I had removed them because of the lack of FAR support for them, couldn't figure out how to add it myself, and kept putting them on forgetting they wearn't recognized properly. This is a HUGE help!
Good job! Now I can use Novapunch's winglets with FAR again
